Olympiad Manager:
After the Olympiad is over, Points of all participants are compared, and ranks are assigned, according to which the reward is allocated as points. To receive the Olympiad Points, you have to participate in 10 or more competitions in 1 month. If your points exceed 40, you can trade your points for Noblesse gate passes. Each Olympiad point may be exchanged for 1,000 Noblesse gate passes, up to 2000 points.
Heroes and the characters who obtained the right to become a hero are given an additional reward as Noblesse gate passes which is equal to 100 Points.
